title: Putting points in mastery delay?
body:
Anyone else notice that there is a delay when putting points in masteries?  can't rapidly left click to add points but you can when taking them back by right clicking.
anyone else have this problem or it's just me?

replies.body: I have have it as well, impossible to do masteries in the last 12 seconds of champ select. This change is really annoying because I always do my mastery page after i decide my champion, which is usually at the end of champ select. Forces me to choose if I want to use last game's mastery page or a half complete mastery page.
